title: log
text:
This is my log. My thoughts, ideas, and experiences. My experiments with the observable truth.
I am TokenBender. I am an engineer, a hacker, a citizen of the world.
I love to learn. I love to make tools. I love to solve problems. I love to create mischievious things.

Consulting
I offer consulting services in the areas of multimodal RAG, advanced search orchestration, building models, datasets, local model deployment. Reach out to me - - email - x - linkedin - github

Philosophy
I am a firm believer in the open web.
My core philosophy is interacting with the AI world via tools of experimentation and observation.
